name: The Ice Cream Clone
description: An ice cream parlor that serves 'cloned' ice cream, perfectly replicating any flavor you can imagine. A cheerful robotic scooper with a friendly, feminine voice asks for your order, its metallic claws surprisingly gentle as it scoops a perfect sphere of 'peanut butter and regret' ice cream into a cone. The air is thick with the scent of sugar and the faint, almost imperceptible, hum of the flavor replicator. It's a place where you can have any ice cream you desire, but you might leave with the unsettling feeling that you've just eaten a delicious, and slightly unsettling, lie.
